Import and Export Settings

When updating the Plating Generator, you can export and import your Presets, Greeble Libraries and other general settings. Your settings will be saved to a .JSON file.

To Export Settings

  1. Go to Edit - Preferences in Blender.

  2. Go to the Add-Ons section.

  3. Search for the Plating and Greebles Generator add-on.

  4. At the bottom, there will be an Export Settings button.

  5. Click the button and choose the directory and name of the JSON file.

  6. Click Export Settings.

To Import Settings

  1. Go to Edit - Preferences in Blender.

  2. Go to the Add-Ons section.

  3. Search for the Plating and Greebles Generator add-on.

  4. At the bottom, there will be an Import Settings button.

  5. Click the button and navigate to the JSON file you exported earlier.

  6. Click Import Settings.
